flute.title: Beginning Flute
flute.description: This class will help you improve on specific elements of your technique that are crucial to getting off to a good start.

flute.title: Proper Posture for Learning Flute
flute.description: Speaking of posture, there are a few key things you should remember to help you learn how to play flute comfortably.

flute.title: How to Learn Flutes Notes Quickly
flute.description: Here are the steps you can follow to learn flute notes for beginners, as easily and quickly as possible.

trumpet:.title: Beginning Trumpet
trumpet:.description: This class will help you improve on specific elements of your technique that are crucial to getting off to a good start.

trumpet:.title: Embouchures for Beginners
trumpet:.description: Because everybody has individual teeth and lip shape, there are a number of embouchures developed. None of them are right or wrong, you'll have to find the way that feels best for you.

trumpet:.title: Breathing, Posture, and Positioning
trumpet:.description: There are a few key things you should remember to help you learn how to play the trumpet comfortably.

acoustic-guitar:.title: Beginning Acoustic Guitar
acoustic-guitar:.description: This class will help you get started with some of the most essential information you need to begin playing guitar.

acoustic-guitar:.title: Strumming Patterns
acoustic-guitar:.description: In this lesson, we'll be learning two easy chords and two basic strumming patterns.

acoustic-guitar:.title: Four chords to start playing in a band
acoustic-guitar:.description: A lot of guitarists are intimidated by the thought of playing in a band. However, with just a few simple chord shapes you can start playing with other musicians right away.
